product_name: CliniqueBlack Honey Makeup Vault Set- $85 with any Clinique purchase
summary: SummaryClinique Black Honey Makeup Vault Set includes 4 ways to wear Clinique's cult-classic shade, plus Pink Honey Almost Lipstick. $85 with any Clinique purchase. A $138 value.
details: DetailsBenefitsA whole lot of Honey - from the lip legend that started it all to dramatic lashes.Almost Lipstick in Black Honey glides on a sheer, glossy slip of lightweight lip color. Not quite lipstick, not quite gloss—its texture is more like a balm you can easily layer.Black Honey looks incredible, yet different, on everyone. It’s famous for its chameleon-like ability to flatter all skin tones. The secret is its perfect blend of blue, red, and yellow pigments in a creamy, sheer base that melts into lips, playing up their natural color.Fan-favorite Pink Honey Almost Lipstick shade is a soft, sheer pink. Adds a touch of color and shine to lips.High Impact Mascara in Black Honey kicks up the volume and length of each and every lash for lusher, plusher, bolder lashes.High Impact Gel Tech Eyeliner in Black Honey is a color-rich, waterline-safe gel pencil that glides on smoothly and stays put—for 24hr wear on lids, 12hr on waterline.Clinique Pop Lip + Cheek Oil in Black Honey is a two-in-one tinted oil that delivers a dewy pop of color for lips and cheeks.Free of: parabens and phthalates.Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.IncludesAlmost Lipstick in Black Honey (0.04 oz)Almost Lipstick in Pink Honey (0.04 oz)Full-Size High Impact Mascara in Black Honey (0.28 oz)Full-Size High Impact Gel Tech Eyeliner in Black Honey (0.01 oz)Full-Size Clinique Pop Lip + Cheek Oil in Black Honey (0.23 oz)Limited-Edition ClutchItem 2641046How To UseApply Almost Lipstick directly to lips. Swipe on one coat for a sheer tint. Keep building it for more drama.Apply High Impact Mascara starting at lash roots, wiggling brush up to lash tips. Repeat to build. For lower lashes, hold wand vertically. Avoid pumping the brush in the container - this adds air that can dry out mascara. To prevent clumping, let mascara dry between coats.High Impact Gel Tech Eyeliner is safe to apply directly on waterline and lid. Build intensity as desired.Apply Clinique Pop Lip + Cheek Oil to lips and cheeks. Blend onto cheek quickly with fingertips.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply Almost Lipstick directly to lips. Swipe on one coat for a sheer tint. Keep building it for more drama.Apply High Impact Mascara starting at lash roots, wiggling brush up to lash tips. Repeat to build. For lower lashes, hold wand vertically. Avoid pumping the brush in the container - this adds air that can dry out mascara. To prevent clumping, let mascara dry between coats.High Impact Gel Tech Eyeliner is safe to apply directly on waterline and lid. Build intensity as desired.Apply Clinique Pop Lip + Cheek Oil to lips and cheeks. Blend onto cheek quickly with fingertips.

reviews.headline: Cardboard Clutch
reviews.comments: I am so disappointed that I did not read the reviews before I purchased this kit. The "clutch" is made of cardboard and is just packaging- not a clutch. I expected a quality from Clinique, or at least what was described. Two thumbs down.

reviews.headline: Cardboard "clutch"?
reviews.comments: Super disappointing that this set is described as containing a "clutch".  The thing is cardboard. The products are great, but I literally laughed out loud at the junk they call a clutch.

reviews.headline: Not bad
reviews.comments: If you want to try the black honey collection this does save you a little money. I had already tried the black honey lip gloss separately and i think the lip cheek oil is better quality. It's less sticky than the gloss, more versitle, and the pigment spreads more evenly when applying. I do agree with the other reviews about the carrying case "clutch" that is included with the set, its laughable that they're marketing it as anything. It is made out of cardboard and I immediately threw mine away in my recycling bin, its just basic consumer packaging. Otherwise the products ring true to clinique.

reviews.headline: Love the black honey collection
reviews.comments: Extremely disappointed in this collaboration to celebrate black honey, and Clinique would go as far as to sell this and market this as a clutch. It's made of cardboard - at the very least they could've done this in metal.

reviews.headline: Good way to try new products
reviews.comments: I like the black honey line and was excited to try the liner and mascara.  All the products in this set are great. However, It's a real stretch to refer to this as a clutch. It's a cheap cardboard box with a magnetic closure. I'm using it to store eyeliner pencils.

reviews.headline: Not Quite 5-Stars
reviews.comments: The variety in this kit is nice. Getting Black Honey essentials plus the chance to try the oil and Pink Honey Almost Lipstick was cool. The case could be better quality. If it were in a zip pouch or something else that felt reusable, that would feel like a better value.

reviews.headline: More expensive than buying separately
reviews.comments: Why is this $6 more than if you bought them separately?? Isnt the point of a bundle to save

rollup.name: Black Honey Makeup Vault Set- $85 with any Clinique purchase
